objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FF4500'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FF6347'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFA07A'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FF7F50'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalGrad1)'/><path d='M1080 0 L0 1080 L1080 1080 Z' fill='url(#diagonalGrad2)'/><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='15' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='300' cy='150' r='10' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='150' cy='300' r='12' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='800' cy='800' r='15' fill='#FF4500'/><circle cx='900' cy='750' r='10' fill='#FF4500'/><circle cx='750' cy='900' r='12' fill='#FF4500'/></g><path d='M0 540 L1080 540' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M540 0 L540 1080' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.1'/><g transform='rotate(45 540 540)'><rect x='420' y='-100' width='2' height='1280' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'/><rect x='660' y='-100' width='2' height='1280' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Non-Slip Design
• Breathable Mesh Fabric
• Slip-On Technology
• Multi-Sport Performance

product_details.description: Slip on design easy to wear, fashion colour with everything Non-slip Wear-resistant outsole Comfortable and breathable fabric Occasion: casual, walking, running,driving , training, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, workout and so on. Multi-color choose: Black, Brown, Dark Grey, Green Yellow, Blue, Orange, Pink, Purple, Rose Red Sole material - Thermoplastic Polyurethane ** Outer material - Mesh ** Closure type - Pull-On ** Water resistance level - Not Water Resistant **

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner showcases a bold, sporty theme aimed at athletic footwear lovers. The background is styled with intersecting diagonal gradients and subtle geometric overlays, delivering a dynamic and modern feel. The top contains two prominent text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in a blocky, futuristic font, highlighting the product category. Below, a thinner subheadline ("tagline") promotes a comfort feature of the product. Accompanying bullet points in "description" detail multiple product benefits. A large, eye-catching price is displayed via the "price" layer. The "cta_background" and "cta" layers create a button inviting action. Positioned prominently is the "product_image", a floating sneaker visual. 

**Color Palette:**
- Fiery Orange (#FF4500)
- Coral (#FF6347)
- Light Salmon (#FFA07A)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Tomato (#FF7F50)
product_color: The product image showcases a bold, sporty pair of sneakers primarily in vibrant purple (#6A0DAD), exuding energy and modernity. The dominant purple tone is seamlessly blended with white text accents (#FFFFFF), which highlight branding and design features, adding contrast and clarity. The structured sole introduces a secondary white-gray tone (#D9D9D9), balancing the intensity of purple and giving a clean, futuristic edge. This contrast enhances depth while giving a tech-forward appeal. For an advertisement banner, a dynamic color palette of Purple (#6A0DAD), Electric Violet (#8F00FF), White (#FFFFFF), Gray (#D9D9D9), and Black (#000000) would create a visually striking and appealing presentation.
